channel.title: Can I post a thread about a contest?
channel.description:
In September I'am going to be giving away two steam games in a forum posting contest.
Can I post the details about here on black mesa? And if so, what forum section should it go in?

item.title: Can I post a thread about a contest?
item.dc:creator: _kev
item.description:
Raminator:

Please don’t advertise your contests/scams/raffles/giveaways/sweepstakes here. We’ll extend you the same courtesy in return.

10-4, and thank you for your time.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I post a thread about a contest?

item.title: Can I post a thread about a contest?
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
I suppose more accurately, forum moderators, hence it being in Website Support in the first place. Still, I like the fact he’s doing it right and asking nicely in the right place, rather than just going for it, etc. Hence I was kinda hoping for an equally nice (and complete) answer…

Read full topic
item.source: Can I post a thread about a contest?

item.description:
Ramizeroid is being sarcastic and apparently I missed the part where ~kev~ was specifying that he only wanted replies from team members

item.title: Can I post a thread about a contest?
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
Ah - couldn’t tell as he doesn’t have a special title under his username like the other team members I have seen around here.
Would still like to know why not tho.

item.title: Can I post a thread about a contest?
item.dc:creator: _kev
item.description:
Samapico:

Screw the contest, just give them to me.

What kind of contest?

Its just a forum posting contest for the month of september. But I do not want to post a link until I get permission.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I post a thread about a contest?

item.description:

Either way, that would go in the Off Topic forum, me thinks.
